name: The Little Match Girl 3: The Escalus Manifold
name_original: The Little Match Girl 3: The Escalus Manifold
description:
In The Little Match Girl 3 by Hans Christian Andersen, the little match girl collects shards from the Mirror of Belial in an effort to thwart the villainous Snow Queen. This one has a cool combat system with spells and critical hits and stuff.

The Little Match Girl series of games is rated T for Teen.

(Scrollbars are disabled because they cause weird input problems in itch's iframe. The version here has scrolling if you like to scroll up and down.)
